title: Murban’s Growing Market Depth Puts It Head-to-Head With WTI in Asia
description: Back in 2016, Murban crude was introduced into the Dubai basket, along with Al-Shaheen, as a response to a lack of supply and price volatility caused by limited physical crude availability for the benchmark. Murban comes from the Murban oil field in Abu Dhabi…
content:
